chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (sx : set), Iter_rem_aux m z sx = (let n := (ndN m - card sx)%nat in let zn := Iter (f m) n z in if exds_dec sx zn then Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds sx zn) else sx)

Premises:
exds_dec : forall (s : set) (z : dart), {exds s z} + {~ exds s z}
dart = nat : Set
ndN = fix ndN (m : fmap) : nat := match m with | V => 0%nat | I m0 x _ _ => if exd_dec m0 x then ndN m0 else (1 + ndN m0)%nat | L m0 _ _ _ => ndN m0 end : fmap -> nat
Ds = fix Ds (s : set) (z : dart) {struct s} : set := match s with | Vs => Vs | Is s0 x => if eq_dart_dec x z then Ds s0 z else Is (Ds s0 z) x end : set -> dart -> set
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0%nat => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Inductive set : Set := Vs : set | Is : set -> dart -> set
card = fix card (s : set) : nat := match s with | Vs => 0%nat | Is s0 x => if exds_dec s0 x then card s0 else (1 + card s0)%nat end : set -> nat
f = M.f : fmap -> dart -> dart
Iter_rem_aux = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => Fix Rs_wf (fun _ : set => set) (Iter_rem_F m z) : fmap -> dart -> set -> set
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
Rs = fun sy sx : set => (card sy < card sx)%nat : set -> set -> Prop
Iter_rem = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => Iter_rem_aux m z (fmap_to_set m) : fmap -> dart -> set
Iter_rem_F : fmap -> dart -> forall sx : set, (forall sy : set, Rs sy sx -> set) -> set
Iter_upb = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => (ndN m - card (Iter_rem m z))%nat : fmap -> dart -> nat
Iter_upb_aux = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => (ndN m - card (Iter_rem_aux m z s))%nat : fmap -> dart -> set -> nat
exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (f m) n z)
BinIntDef.Z.quotrem = fun a b : Z => match a with | 0 => (0, 0) | Z.pos a0 => match b with | 0 => (0, a) | Z.pos b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in (BinIntDef.Z.of_N q, BinIntDef.Z.of_N r) | Z.neg b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in (- BinIntDef.Z.of_N q, BinIntDef.Z.of_N r) end | Z.neg a0 => match b with | 0 => (0, a) | Z.pos b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in (- BinIntDef.Z.of_N q, - BinIntDef.Z.of_N r) | Z.neg b0 => let (q, r)...
Nat2Z.inj_sub : forall n m : nat, (m <= n)%nat -> Z.of_nat (n - m) = Z.of_nat n - Z.of_nat m
Zne_left : forall n m : Z, Zne n m -> Zne (n + - m) 0
Zegal_left : forall n m : Z, n = m -> n + - m = 0
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y z then x...
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y z then x else if...
cA_cA_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z) /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z)
inj_minus2 : forall n m : nat, (m > n)%nat -> Z.of_nat (n - m) = 0
cA_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z)
cA_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z)
nd_card : forall m : fmap, ndN m = card (fmap_to_set m)
Zge_left : forall n m : Z, n >= m -> 0 <= n + - m
Zle_left : forall n m : Z, n <= m -> 0 <= m + - n
cA_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA m k z = (if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z)
cA_1_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 m k z = (if pred_dec m k z then A_1 m k z else top m k z)
bottom = fix bottom (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else bottom m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y (bottom m0 k0 z) then bottom m0 k0 x else bottom m0 k0 z else bottom m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
top = fix top (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else top m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x (top m0 k0 z) then top m0 k0 y else top m0 k0 z else top m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
exd_Iter_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (f_1 m) n z)
Nat2Z.inj_add : forall n m : nat, Z.of_nat (n + m) = Z.of_nat n + Z.of_nat m

```coq
intros m z sx.
unfold Iter_rem_aux.
set (n := ndN m - card sx)%nat.
set (zn := Iter (f m) n z).
destruct (exds_dec sx zn) as [Hsxz | Hsxnz].
- rewrite <- (Iter_rem_F m z sx).
  reflexivity.
- rewrite <- (Iter_rem_F m z sx).
  reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: intros m z sx. unfold Iter_rem_aux.
